author: rnewson
msg: Since Filipe's fix for parsing the accepted content types at r1041103, returns from
$.ajax could return a 302 that redirects to an HTML page. Functions like activeTasks()
expect JSON and barf when fed HTML.

author: rnewson
msg: set cookie security flags correctly when using built-in SSL

author: elecharny
msg: Sped up the schema loading by getting rid of Pattern matching. It goes twice faster now.

author: rbowen
msg: Small improvements in phrasing of the access control doc.
